Content: Minister of internal and Home Affairs, Provincial Councils and Local Government VajiraAbeywardene has said that National Day becomes more complete through the presence of social, political, and economic freedom as well as human dignity and spiritual freedom. In a message marking National Day, the Minister said that with a proud history behind us, we celebrate the 71st anniversary of gaining independence from the colonial rule. He said that the strongest weapon used to gain independence for the country in 1948 was the existence of unity among all communities living in it. The Minister said that after gaining independence, the biggest challenge we faced was safeguarding that unity and stepping towards the future.
